review: I have met him when I had been to Delhi. ** ** * **** **** ******. He examined closely and suggested some medical tests including Ultrasound scan and three more blood tests. Later I was diagnosed for a Kidney stone and was suggested to consult a Urologist. But I live in Mumbai and I couldn't make it immediately. I will visit again in the next month. But the overall experience was very good.

The doctor did not care to listen to our symptoms *** ****** ** ******* *** ***** ** *** ***** When I said I’ve increased heartbeat problem he said “when we are conscious we can hear heartbeat, dil hai toh dhadkega he” . And when I said I have anxiety and panic issues, he said “socho kam” . I told him I have 130 heart rate which he ignored.
bad experience take rs 800 only for 5 min dont go not explain anything to the patient doesn't listen to our words very bad experience ..
